languages.text: "Простите мою болтливую напарницу, Ваша Светлость. Смею заверить, за сотни лет службы еще ни один Вольный Торговец не погиб во время купания".
"Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."
languages.original_text: "Простите мою болтливую напарницу, Ваша Светлость. Смею заверить, за сотни лет службы еще ни один Вольный Торговец не погиб во время купания".

traits.locale_text: "Please excuse my partner's big mouth, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I can assure you, in hundreds of years of service, not a single Rogue Trader has died while bathing just yet."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

traits.locale_text: "Please excuse my partner's big mouth, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I can assure you, in hundreds of years of service, not a single Rogue Trader has died while bathing just yet."

traits.locale_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: « Je vous prie d'excuser ma partenaire, Votre Seigneurie. Elle parle trop. Je peux vous assurer qu'au cours des siècles de service de notre clan, aucun libre-marchand n'est jamais mort en prenant un bain. »
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie d'excuser ma partenaire, Votre Seigneurie. Elle parle trop. Je peux vous assurer qu'au cours des siècles de service de notre clan, aucun libre-marchand n'est jamais mort en prenant un bain. »
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: «Disculpe a mi compañera, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Habla demasiado. Le aseguro que, en los cien años de servicio de nuestro clan, ningún Comerciante Independiente ha muerto en la bañera».
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe a mi compañera, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Habla demasiado. Le aseguro que, en los cien años de servicio de nuestro clan, ningún Comerciante Independiente ha muerto en la bañera».
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: “请原谅我的同伴，大人，她实在是太能说了。我可以向您保证，在我们氏族服侍的几百年间，没有任何一位行商浪人在洗澡期间不幸丧命。”
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我的同伴，大人，她实在是太能说了。我可以向您保证，在我们氏族服侍的几百年间，没有任何一位行商浪人在洗澡期间不幸丧命。”
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: 「私のパートナーを許してください、陛下。彼女は喋りすぎです。我が一族の数百年の歴史で入浴中に死んだローグトレーダーはおりません」
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."

traits.locale_text: 「私のパートナーを許してください、陛下。彼女は喋りすぎです。我が一族の数百年の歴史で入浴中に死んだローグトレーダーはおりません」
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: "Bitte entschuldigt meine Kameradin, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie redet zu viel. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass in den hunderten von Jahren, die unser Clan bereits dient, noch nie ein Freihändler beim Baden gestorben ist."
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte entschuldigt meine Kameradin, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie redet zu viel. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass in den hunderten von Jahren, die unser Clan bereits dient, noch nie ein Freihändler beim Baden gestorben ist."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathMale

languages.text: "Arkadaşımın kusuruna bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Biraz fazla konuşur. Sizi temin ederim ki klanımızın hizmette bulunduğu yüzlerce yıl içinde hiçbir Hür Tacir, banyo yaparken ölmemiştir."
languages.original_text: "Please excuse my partner, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She talks too much. I can assure you that in our clan's hundreds of years of service, no Rogue Trader has ever died while taking a bath."
